name: Nowadays
description:
• Name of the game:
    Nowadays
  • Theme:
    Easy to play, Hard to be good at.
    Express Yourself.
  • Mini launch:
    Nowadays is a runner game where you are playing as a ball in this big grey city. This place represents our society, which in most cases forces us to be someone who is not true to ourselves; try to keep your color by avoiding the obstacles in your way, buy skins by picking up point-trust to reforce your image and... Don't let this world change who you are!
  • How you play: 
    Movement:  A - D & Left & Right Arrows 
    Jump: SpaceBar
    Transformation(Pretending): T keybind
    Pause: Escape 
  • Team Name: 
    VHS
  • Team Members: 
    Mateo Monge 📝
    Anthony Gutierrez 🎨
    Marbin Taboada 💻
    Jose Leiva  💻
    Alvaro Ramos 🎨
    Daniel Calderon 🎨
